content: We start with our ICO offer on Dec 15, 2022. here is some official data on our project:Web page: https://avescoin.ioSource code and wallet:https://github.com/Aves-ProjectIco web page:https://ico.avecoin.ioDiscord:https://discord.com/invite/NDhQBnWBVYFacebook:https://www.facebook.com/profile.php?id=100087682682579Twitter:https://twitter.com/NetworkAvesThe NFT marketplace will be open at a time when ICO starts.We have negotiations with trust foundations so our company and investors will make this story big.Any enthusiasts and volunteers are welcome because we need numbers to make this project victory.
